remarks: Relate a limit in a given topology to a complex number limit, provided that topology agrees with the common topology on ` CC ` on the required subset.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Jul-2017.)
statement:
lmlim.j $e |- J e. ( TopOn ` Y ) $.
lmlim.f $e |- ( ph -> F : NN --> X ) $.
lmlim.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. X ) $.
lmlim.t $e |- ( J |`t X ) = ( ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |`t X ) $.
lmlim.x $e |- X C_ CC $.
lmlim $p |- ( ph -> ( F ( ~~>t ` J ) P <-> F ~~> P ) ) $.
